note:
Hello, I'm a queer human being and do not wish to label myself further.

I think everyone should use their abilities to help and support others, because only if we treat each other well we can create a world worth living in.
This is not a complete rejection of violence, it should just be rarely and with caution, but no tolerance for intolerance.

I am curious and try many things but my most beloved skills are Maths and Photography (although I will not share any pictures on here for privacy reasons)
Most of the time I listen to metal and use Linux since 2019, but sadly I am only able to profit of those and lack the ability to create of my own.

This account is not for interaction with people I know in real life and therefore I won't share a lot of my work on here

Profile picture is a small flame in otherwise complete darkness
Banner shows detailed spray water edited to a "pinkscale" version
